text: Androctonus amoreuxi, also known as the African fat-tailed scorpion or Tunisian fat-tailed scorpion, is a species of fat-tailed scorpion. It lives in North Africa, Tunisia, Mali, and Asia. Its sting can kill. The adult scorpion is about 70 mm long. Its shell is yellow in color. == Sting == The Tunisian fat-tail's sting contains deadly venom enough to kill a human. == References == Category:Scorpions Category:Animals of Asia
title: Androctonus amoreuxi
